description: This system is only for reports of possible fake information at the local or state level.
incorrect: US officially marks 1 million American deaths from Covid.
personalInfo: Please donâ€™t include any personally identifying information about yourself or others.
title: Add a Report Title
detailDescription: Please share as much as you can. We need at least one of the following: a link, a photo, or a detailed description.
imageDescription: You can upload screenshots or photos of the potentially inaccurate information
detailedDescription: Please provide more details about the potentially inaccurate information, such as where you saw it and what it said.
atLeast: We need at least one of the following: a link, a photo, or a detailed description.
which_agency: Which agency would you like to report to?
about: What is the potentially inaccurate information about?
where: Where did you see the potentially inaccurate information?
provide_title: Please provide a title for the potentially inaccurate information
upload: You can upload screenshots or photos of the potentially inaccurate information
noAgencies: There are no participating newsrooms in this area.
thanksText: We investigate as many reports as possible, although we aren't always able to get to everything. When we're able, we'd love to share the results of our investigation.
